sub_title: Business Development Director at Unusual Enterprise
summary:
I am a senior project manager at the Netherlands Foreign Investment Agency (NFIA) based in Consulate General of the Kingdom of the Netherlands in Istanbul and I am responsible for assisting companies in Turkey which consider investing in the Netherlands. 

Free, confidential services offered include: connecting you with up-to-date information, relevant business partners, government authorities and a variety of Dutch networks and service suppliers;
organizing fact-finding trips and site selection missions with network of regional economic development partners; arranging meetings with these partners; and providing personalized guidance and counsel on tax, government and permit procedures, location options and business solutions.

Specialties: Foreign Direct Investment - Acquisition of new projects for The Netherlands, Stakeholder Management, Public Affairs, Strategy Development, Business Development, Project Management, Marketing & Communication, Innovation, Innovation Management, Sales
